website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for customers who want the benefits of fluoride, combined with natural ingredients other than peroxide to whiten teeth. However, it may not be the best choice for extremely stubborn stains.
pros: Earns praise from those who have sensitive teeth for its natural silica formula that gently removes most stains
Unlike some other natural brands, it contains fluoride that helps prevent cavities
cons: May not be effective on hard-to-remove stains, such as those caused by smoking or coffee drinking

customer_reviews.title: and it seems to clean the chompers pretty well too
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now. I think it's making my fangs a little brighter. It happens relatively slowly, but I do believe I see a difference, and it seems to clean the chompers pretty well too.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred D. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is the only brand of toothpaste I can use without having allergic reactions. Fortunately, this paste leaves the teeth feeling so very smooth, and the flavor is not overpowering or the burn intense.
customer_reviews.author: di2buydoodads

customer_reviews.title: I haven't notice a major difference from my previous brand
customer_reviews.text: It's good toothpaste so far (past two months), but I don't see any improvement over the Crest brand I have been using for years. I'll finish the tube, but not sure I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Not as minty as I would like it to be
customer_reviews.text: Not as minty as I would like it to be. Otherwise, it is like any other toothpaste. Nothing exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not  as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a few years ago when it was called All-In --One. When I hit the buy again button and received my shipment it came as whitening not All-In -One?? Please Advise
customer_reviews.author: Ruvain

customer_reviews.title: Natural Dentist Healthy Teeth and Gums Whitening Toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: Fine everyday toothpaste a basic everyday toothpaste quality should be. It's good one though expensive. For $4 would be a nice choice for a regular everyday toothpaste
customer_reviews.author: cyberbee17

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about this toothpaste is that it doesn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this toothpaste is that it doesn't have any strange ingredients that leave your teeth (and your entire being) feeling vulnerable. The mouthwash is also great.
customer_reviews.author: ~Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent whitening toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Natural Dentist Whitening for 3 years, and love it. It makes my smile lo0k polished white and my gums a heathy pink. It has the peppermint taste you would expect from a toothpaste. It used to be difficult to find, so happy Amazon finally the Natural Dentist line of products available.
customer_reviews.author: Pria

customer_reviews.title: SLS free
customer_reviews.text: I have a tendency to get sores in my mouth...some sort of a viral thing. When I do, toothpaste that has sls (sodium lauryl sulfate) aggravates my situation. I need an sls free toothpaste. That is what this toothpaste is. It is the only thing to use.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toothpaste - and I feel healthier brushing my teeth morning, noon, and night!
customer_reviews.author: #1 Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive teeth & gums. Since using this product no more sensitivity & no more bleeding gums!!!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is good. It is actually more minty than the pepepermint twist flavor. But, i didn't realize that it is flouride free and i need the flouride.
customer_reviews.author: cmp

product_meta.title: Natural Dentist Healthy Teeth and Gums Whitening Toothpaste Peppermint Twist, 5 Ounce
product_meta.description: The Natural Dentist was created by a dentist to provide effective oral care for his patients' teeth and gums. Because our products are formulated with a scientific blend of natural ingredients, you don't have to choose between natural and effective.
feature_bullets: Natural dentist healthy teeth and gums whitening toothpaste peppermint twist
It also offers maximum protection against cavities and acid erosion - without SLS, artificial dyes, artificial sweeteners or preservatives
Let us know how our products work for you and what we might do better
